element-citation.article-title: Validation of a Lactic Acid-and Citric Acid-Based Antimicrobial Product for the Reduction of Escherichia Coli O157:H7 and Salmonella on Beef Tips and Whole Chicken Carcasses Internalization and Thermal Susceptibility of Shiga Toxin-Producing Escherichia Coli (STEC) in Marinated Beef Products View Project Beef Flavor View Project
